meanings.definition: An individual article or unit, especially one that is part of a list, collection, or set.
meanings.sent1: She carefully placed the small items in her bag.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of items, from clothing to electronics.
meanings.sent3: The items in the treasure chest turned out to be just colorful rocks.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like precious items stored in a hidden box.
meanings.sent5: The items on the shelf sparkled under the bright lights of the store.

meanings.definition: A particular object or piece of information.
meanings.sent1: He picked up the mysterious items left on the table.
meanings.sent2: The detective carefully examined the items found at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The items in the old book were actually secret codes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a rare item that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The items of knowledge in his mind were like puzzle pieces waiting to be connected.
